description: Seeks to track the performance of the Bloomberg Global Aggregate ex-USD Float Adjusted RIC Capped Index (Hedged).Employs hedging strategies that seek to mitigate uncertainty in exchange rates.Passively managed, using index sampling.Fund remains fully invested.Broad exposure across major bond markets outside of the United States.Low expenses minimize net tracking error.With respect to 75% of its total assets, the fund may not: (1) purchase more than 10% of the outstanding voting securities of any one issuer or (2) purchase securities of any issuer if, as a result, more than 5% of the fund’s total assets would be invested in that issuer’s securities; except as may be necessary to approximate the composition of its target index. This limitation does not apply to obligations of the U.S. government or its agencies or instrumentalities.
name: Vanguard Total International Bond ETF
